attributes.description:
2018 Audi A4 1.4 TFSi S Tronic S line for sale.
Full house sedan with great economy and lots of performance in the beautiful S line package.
Standard Features: ABS Brakes | Air Conditioning | Airbags | Alloy Wheels | Central Locking | Climate Control | EBD Electronic Brake Distribution | Electric Windows | PDC | Multi-Function Steering | Power Steering | Radio/CD | Bluetooth | Leather interior | Keyless Go | Sunroof | Sport Leather seats 
Car has full service history and spare key.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee.
Warranty options are available.

Audi A4 1.4 TFSI Sport STronic
Power - 110 kW @ 1500 rpm
Torque - 250 Nm @ 2500 rpm
Economy - 4.9 l/100km
Emissions - 114 g/km
Emissions Rating - EU6
Gears - 7 / FRONT
Acceleration - 8.5 seconds
Top Speed - 210 km/h
Airbags (total) - 4
Length - 4,726 cm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 54 litres
Boot Capacity - 480 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
